cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP control port to 0 (invalid port) will cause SCTP socket binding failure, preventing F1-C connection establishment between CU and DU.

du.explanation_en: Setting Ta4 timing parameters to [0, 0] (invalid values) will cause timing misalignment in front-haul processing, leading to synchronization failures and data transmission errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 Ta4 定時參數設定為 [0, 0]（無效值）會導致前傳處理中的定時錯位，造成同步失敗和數據傳輸錯誤。
